sect2.title: Installation of Ed

note.para: Ed isn't something which many people use. It's installed here because it can be used by the patch program if you encounter an ed-based patch file. This happens rarely because diff-based patches are preferred these days.

sect2.para: This package requires its patch to be applied before you can install it. This patch fixes a symlink vulnerability in ed. The ed executable creates files in /tmp with predictable names. By using various symlink attacks, it is possible to have ed write to files it should not, change the permissions of files, etc.
And finish off installing the package:
We need to move the Ed binaries to the /bin directory so they may be used in the event that the /usr partition is unavailable.
